setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox

user: With focus on the combobox, close the combobox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, close the combobox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to collapsed) is conveyed
